Hello,I am a 20-years-old web application developper
from Montreal,Quebec.

My name is Philippe, I am currently completing my Bachelor of Engineering in Softwate at École de technologie supérieure in Montréal, Canada.

I love coding web applications and working on various systems. I am always looking to learn the best and the most of each projects I am working on. I do work with javascript as a front-end. I do work with back-end technologies. From C# to java passing to .NET and PHP.

I accpet the fact of being a geek :)! However, I don't stay on my laptop all day long. I do like sports, going to movies, having a beer with some cool people. Playing computer games from time to time. I recently join the Lan ETS club at the university.

When I'm not at school or doing sport, I must be at starbuck enjoying a coffe whit some nice people or coding on some projets at a table.

Let's talk! Tweet me @dannytranlx or send me an email ph.potvin@gmail.com :)
